info.brief_description: Come roleplay with me about you being a giant/giantess to the willing shrinkee, me!
info.description:
Decided to bring this out of the trashcan because I was bored. Come give an add if you're down for some roleplay!


This is gonna be a roleplay interactive about me, the shrunken person, and you, the giant/giantess. As you can see, I'm allowing you to either be a giant male or female, so everyone is included!

RULES

1. Me as the shrinkee is always going to be willing to do whatever you want. Shit stuff? I'm down. Stink, that's fine too!
2. Don't leave multiple choices after your chapter, just put one for me to respond to. If you want my chapter to go a certain way shoot me a message. If you don't, then I'll assume you're giving me control.
3. You only control your own character. I don't want to see you controlling what the shrunken person does.


Also, If you're unsure of how to do this/want a slightly different setup, feel free to send me a DM!

Rewards are guaranteed and I'd love to see what you guys come up with!
